column4: Can someone please recommend me a torrent client? Azureus works with encryption on, but it randomly crashes which makes it completely unusable. Everything else I've tried doesn't even work. I'm on comcast, and I know they block bittorrent upload traffic, which is why I need the encyrption
So does anyone have any ideas for a client that might WORK?
azureus with the latest .jar file from azureus.sf.net placed in /usr/share/java
the one that comes with feisty does crash alot
